resources.string:
Jugnoo helps you provide a friendly and affordable ride within the Chandigarh tricity area. 

People with cars can offer rides to users who find taxis a bit too expensive. 

The rates are affordable, and definitely a good deal when you get them for a friendly ride.



 Rate card:
 First 2 kms: Rs.45
 After 2 kms: Rs. 15/km
 Waiting time: Rs.1.5/min
